results.title: Simvastatin reduces fibrosis and protects against muscle weakness after massive rotator cuff tear.
results.text_hl: We hypothesized that after the induction of a massive @<m>DISEASE_Retinal_Perforations</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012167 @@@supraspinatus tear@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ would protect muscles from a loss of force production and @DISEASE_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@fibrosis@@@.

citations.NLM: Davis ME, Korn MA, Gumucio JP, Harning JA, Saripalli AL, Bedi A, Mendias CL. Simvastatin reduces fibrosis and protects against muscle weakness after massive rotator cuff tear. J Shoulder Elbow Surg. 2015 Feb;24(2):280-7. PMID: 25213828

results.title: Three-Dimensional Porous Gelapin-Simvastatin Scaffolds Promoted Bone Defect Healing in Rabbits.
results.text_hl: At first, the effectiveness of different concentrations of Gel and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Sim@@@ powders was investigated in an experimentally induced @<m>DISEASE_Retinal_Perforations</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012167 @@@femoral hole@@@ model in @SPECIES_9986 @@@rabbits@@@ (n = 6) for 30 days.

citations.NLM: Moshiri A, Shahrezaee M, Shekarchi B, Oryan A, Azma K. Three-Dimensional Porous Gelapin-Simvastatin Scaffolds Promoted Bone Defect Healing in Rabbits. Calcif Tissue Int. 2015 Jun;96(6):552-64. PMID: 25804980
